descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Courier New]I wanted to make a great sword that looked like a monster slayer that only a powerful person could use. messed around with it for some time before coming to what i have made. i am happy with the results an hope you guys like it to.

[b][color=#00ff00]It is an end game weapon or legendary difficulty weapon as its base damage is 100 before tempering or adding skill buffs.[/color]
[/b]
If there is demand enough i will make a less powerful esp.

[b][color=#00ff00]Install Via Nexus Mod Manager[/color][/b]

Weapon can be crafted under steel. 
Takes a lot to make it though. 

I will admit 1st person View is not overly great but 3rd person view this sword looks great[/font][/center][center][/center]
author: DeMoNhUnTeR1986
